revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cudy |model=WR1000 |revision=V1 |fcc_date=08/06/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2APRGWR1000V1 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64JVSIQ |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=JCG-XXXXXX-2.4G, JCG-XXXXXX-5G |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:4C,70:79:38 |oui_eth=00:E0:4C,70:79:38 }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.cudytech.com/productinfo/154622.html Poduct page]
The CPU ID is [[MediaTek]] MT7628A. The used speed is 580MHz. Works also with OpenWRT Image wl-wn575a3-squashfs-sysupgrade.bin. Only the LEDs for WiFi do not work. {{See also|Winstars WS-WN535G3E|Winstars WS-WN535G3R}}
===See also=== :[http://www.cudytech.com/ProductInfoCategory?categoryId=52939 Wireless Smart Routers] *[[Cudy WR2600]] - AC2600 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Gigabit Router :● 4x4 802.11ac, 1733Mbps (5GHz) + 600Mbps (2.4GHz) :● Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A + MT7615N + MT7615N :● 5x GbE ports, 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 4x antennas *[[Cudy WR1300]] - AC1300 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Gigabit Router *[[Cudy WR1200]] - AC1200 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Cudy WR1000 V1]] - AC1200 Dual Band Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Cudy WR300]] - N300 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.cudytech.com/productinfo/512212.html PPage] *[[Cudy RE300 V1]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2APRGRE300V1 2APRGRE300V1] (2018-07-25) :OEM: [[Winstars WS-WN578]] (N2H) • [[Winstars WS-WN575A2]]
==Images== <gallery> File:Cudy-Wr1000-top.jpg|Top of board with soldered serial port File:Cudy-WR1000-bottom.jpg|Bottom of board with soldered serial port </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
